name: Edvard Grieg
biography: Edvard Grieg was a Norwegian composer and pianist who composed in the Romantic period. He is best known for his Piano Concerto in A minor and his music to Henrik Ibsen's play 'Peer Gynt', which includes 'Morning Mood' and 'In the Hall of the Mountain King'. Grieg's music drew from the Norwegian folk music tradition, combining it with the Romantic music style of his time.
